text:
@realDonaldTrump We don’t care ab  #Flynn!

What R  u doing ab #Covid19,  deaths, lack of tests, medecine, blood, plasma?
The 27 Million applying for unemployment?
The #PPP going to companies so big they’re publicly traded INSTEAD of going to SMALL Businesses that need it?

#IncompetenceKills
